name: Bearly Noticed
description:
On your adventures, you stumble upon a pile of food. And you are so hungry! Unfortunately, the food is next to a sleeping bear! Do you eat the food?

Try to survive as long as possible, throwing flags at the bear to stun it. 

There's one issue, you can only run in reverse!  Don't let the bear get you!

Controls:

1. Use arrow keys to move

2. Space bar throws the flag

3. Run over the flag to pickup

4. You can run sideways with left and right arrows

5. The bear speeds up over time
